descriptionHtml:
So who is Na'Jora

Well shes a khajiit, and like many Khajiit she loves to eat moon sugar

She enjoys Long walks on the beaches and poisoning various important people, while shooting several others in the back

Main quest up to the horn of jurgen whats his face

thieves guild up to returning the skelly key

She specialises in, you guessed it bows and sneak
but is fairly proficient in one handed



How to Get it in your game:
Simply Download and extract both the save and SKSE file
to where ever your skyrim saves are located

Simples

Mods used to make best of Na'jora

SkyRe : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286
This is pretty much essential

Dynamic Loot : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42662/
(and its patch by Jlizard : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51131/ )
Immersive armours : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733
And weapons : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/

Any other mods are pretty much your own choice

Followers
Throthgar, You know who he is :
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48797/

And Nadina :
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48918/

Now for the more lesser known mods on the workshot

Simply look for a cretor called Zim, he does a bunch of item immprovment mods on the workshop

Basically Get them all Except the atherial crown mod as that messes up a bit with SkyRe

Reason being is his nightingale improvement mod makes it worthwhile
author: Dannydlm
